description:
The world's ultimate transit app! Trip planning, live arrivals, schedules, maps, service alerts and more. Supporting over 60 major US cities (including NY, SF, LA, DC) & 400+ worldwide. ** "Waze for Public Transit" (WSJ)" **

** Apple's Editor Choice in the Navigation category ** NYC MTA App Quest Public Choice Award ** Named “Best New App” in more than 60 countries ** Featured in NYTimes, Bloomberg TV, FastCompany, more 

Key features: 
---------------
•  Live arrivals: Click a nearby station on the map, or search for a specific line and get real time arrival times
•  Trip planner: Compare between alternate routes to your destination
•  Step by step navigation: Easily find your way on the map, including walking directions
•  Real time service alerts / advisories: Receive real time updates with push notifications on the lines you use frequently
•  Static transport system maps for NY, LA, SF, Boston, Chicago, Miami and other popular train / subway / tram systems (a PDF viewer is required).

How is Moovit "powered by the crowd"? 
---------------------------------
Moovit is a real cooperative, community-driven project. We start with complete schedule-based transit information, then add real-time data from operators and users. 

Just by riding with Moovit open, you help contribute live data back to the community. You can also send active reports about your ride or station from the report button. 

Supported metropolitan areas and agencies in the US (currently 62):
•Albany, NY
•Albuquerque, NM
•Ann Arbor: TheRide, UMICH
•Atlanta: Atlanta Rapid Transit, MARTA
•Austin: Capital Metro
•Birmingham, AL
•Boston: Boston Subway, CATA, Massport, MBTA, MetroWest Regional Transit Authority, RIPTA
•Buffalo: NFTA Bus and Metro
•Champaign-Urbana, IL
•Chattanooga, TN
•Chicago: CTA, CTA-L, Metra, PACE
•Cincinnati: SORTA
•Cleveland: RTA
•Coachella Valley: SunLine
•Columbus, OH
•Connecticut
•Dallas / Fort Worth: DART, Commuter Rail, The T
•Delaware
•Denver: RTD
•Detroit: DDOT
•Fresno, CA
•Grand Rapids, MI: The Rapids
•Hartford, CT
•Hampton Roads: HRT
•Honolulu: TheBus
•Huston: METRO
•Indianapolis, IN
•Kansas City: KCATA, The JO
•Las Vegas:  RTC
•Little Rock, AR
•Los Angeles: LA Big Blue Bus, Free Airport Shuttle, LADOT, LAX FlyAway, Metro, METRO, Metrolink Trains, OCTA, PVTransit, Riverside Transit, Torrance Transit
•Louisville:  TARC - Transit Authority of River City
•Madison: Metro Transit
•Miami: BCT, MDT, MDT Metromover, MDT Metrorail
•Milwaukee, WI
•Minneapolis-St.Paul:  Airport (MAC), Maple Grove, Metro Transit, MVTA, Scott County, SouthWest Transit, 
•New York - New Jersey: CTTransit- Stamford, LIRR, Metro-North Railroad, MNR Hudson Rail Link, MTA Bus Company, MTA Rail, Nassau Inter-County Express, NJ TRANSIT, Norwalk Transit, NY Waterway, NYC Subway
•Nashville, TN
•New Haven, CT
•New Orleans RTA: Tram and Bus
•Orlando, FL
•Philadelphia: SEPTA Rail, Subway & Trolley
•Phoenix: Valley Metro LRT
•Pittsburgh: Port Authority Subway & Funicular
•Portland: TriMet
•Raleigh,NC
•Rochester,NY
•Sacramento, CA
•Salem, OR
•Salt Lake City: UTA
•San Antonio, TX
•San Diego: MTS, North County Transit District
•San Francisco Bay Area: AC Transit, AirBART, BART, Baylink, Blue & Gold Fleet, Caltrain, County Connection, Golden Gate Transit, Harbor Bay Ferry, Marin Transit, MUNI, SamTrans, SF Cable Car, VTA
•Santa Fe, NM
•Savannah, GA
•Seattle: Kitsap Transit, Metro Transit, ST Bus & Light Rail
•St. Louis: Metro St. Louis
•Tampa - St. Petersburg: Hillsborough Area Regional Transit, PSTA
•Topeka, KS
•Tucson, AZ
•Washington, DC -Baltimore,MD: Arlington Transit, DC Circulator, MARC, MET, Metro Subway, MTA, RideOn
•Wichita, KS

We'd love to hear from you and stay connected:
• Facebook: http://facebook.com/moovit 
• Twitter: @moovitapp

Note: Continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life.
trackCensoredName: Moovit: Bus Train Metro Subway - Live Transit App with Map Schedules and Next Bus
trackName: Moovit: Bus Train Metro Subway - Live Transit App with Map Schedules and Next Bus
releaseNotes:
• People of Anchorage, Memphis, El Paso, Lexington & Bakersfield - Welcome to Moovit! 
• "Favourite Lines" Widget improvements. Add it to your notification center for quick access to arrival times of your favourite lines. 
• Over 10 additional metros were added (we now support over 400 worldwide!) including: The entire Republic of Ireland, Palermo (Italy), Valladolid & Las Palmas de Gran Canaria (Spain), Bratislava (Slovakia), Melbourne & Hobart (Australia)
• New language- introducing Moovit in Thai! 
• Bug fixes & performance improvements
